Articles.Content: HELP HELP HELP. I have a little big problem when i use a decoupler in the VAB. the decoupers are puffing steam or gas. if i use this decoupler, it wil not separate from the main part. i read that tweakscale was the problem but i deleted tweakscale and they are still puffing. so, if anyone could help me out with this problem, i would be a very happy guy. thanks
You will need to provide a list of your mods and an output_log.txt file as described in the how to get support sticky thread in this subforum.
